taxon.author: Castanheira & Framenau, 2023
taxon.distribution: Australia (South Australia, New South Wales, Capital Territory, Victoria, Tasmania)

referenceObject.reference: Castanheira, P. de S. & Framenau, V. W. (2023b). Kangaraneus, a new genus of orb-weaving spider from Australia (Araneae, Araneidae). Zoosystematics and Evolution 99(2): 307-323.
